0.question: What is KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES?
0.answer: It is a digital platform connecting vehicle owners with verified Partners for on-site servicing and repairs.

1.question: How does the platform work?
1.answer: Customers request a service, we match them with a verified partner nearby, and the partner comes to the customer's location to perform the requested service.

2.question: What types of services are available?
2.answer: From routine maintenance to repairs and diagnostics, we support a wide range of vehicle services. Check the service list in the app for details.

3.question: How are payments handled?
3.answer: Payments are processed securely through our payment gateway. Customers can pay via cards or UPI depending on availability.

4.question: When do Partners receive their payments?
4.answer: Partners receive payouts after successful completion of the service and after any necessary verification/processes are completed.

5.question: Are payments safe on this platform?
5.answer: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption and a trusted payment gateway to secure transactions.

6.question: How are refunds processed?
6.answer: Refunds are handled case-by-case. If eligible, refunds will be processed to the original payment method within the timeline described in our policy.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy

1.title: 1. INFORMATION COLLECTION
1.content: KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES collects user information including personal details, contact information, vehicle details, location data, and payment information to facilitate service bookings and improve user experience.

2.title: 2. DATA USAGE
2.content: Collected data is used for service facilitation, customer support, payment processing, service improvements, and regulatory compliance. We do not sell or rent user data to third parties.

3.title: 3. DATA SHARING
items: - Information is shared with verified Partners for service delivery
- Payment data is processed through secure RBI-regulated gateways
- Location data is shared with Partners for service location identification
- Contact information is shared for service coordination

4.title: 4. DATA SECURITY
items: a) All data transmission uses encrypted SSL/TLS protocols
b) Payment information is tokenized and not stored on our servers
c) Access to user data is restricted to authorized personnel only
d) Regular security audits are conducted to maintain data integrity
e) User authentication uses secure token-based systems

5.title: 5. USER RIGHTS
items: - Right to access personal information
- Right to update or correct personal data
- Right to request data deletion
- Right to opt-out of marketing communications
- Right to data portability

6.title: 6. COOKIES & TRACKING
6.content: The platform uses cookies and similar technologies for session management, user preferences, analytics, and service optimization. Users can manage cookie preferences through browser settings.

7.title: 7. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
7.content: We integrate with third-party services including payment gateways (Razorpay, PayU), mapping services, and communication providers. These services have their own privacy policies and data handling practices.

8.title: 8. DATA RETENTION
8.content: User data is retained for the duration necessary to provide services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Users can request data deletion as per applicable regulations.

9.title: 9. CONTACT INFORMATION
9.content: For privacy-related queries, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@koustubhafastservices.com or through the contact details provided on our platform.

privacy_policy.footer: © 2025 KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES. All rights reserved.

business_policy.title: Business Policy

1.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
1.content: This Business Policy outlines the operational standards and business ethics of KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES ("the Company"). It governs the functioning of the platform connecting vehicle owners with independent Partners through the "Swift Service" app.

2.title: 2. OBJECTIVE
2.content: To provide transparent, affordable, and efficient vehicle servicing solutions while empowering independent Partners with fair earning opportunities and customers with quality service.

3.title: 3. BUSINESS MODEL
3.content: The Company operates as a digital facilitator. Partners and Customers voluntarily interact through the platform. The Company does not employ Partners nor perform services directly.

4.title: 4. PAYMENT & CHARGES STRUCTURE
items: - Platform Fee: ₹800/day (Partners using company resources), ₹500/day (own resources).
- Commission: 8% of total labour charges.
- GST: 18% on labour and parts (as per SAC 9987 and HSN codes).
- Prices and taxes are subject to government changes.

5.title: 5. BANKS & PAYMENT GATEWAYS CLAUSE
items: a) All payments made by Customers are processed through RBI-authorized gateways such as Razorpay and PayU.
b) Accepted methods include UPI, IMPS, NEFT, debit/credit cards, and wallets.
c) All customer collections are routed through the official current account of KOUSTUBHA DAIRY & FARMS and transferred to Partners via NEFT, IMPS, or Wallet transfers.
d) The Company is compliant with PCI-DSS and RBI's data protection regulations.
e) Refunds, if applicable, are processed within 7-10 working days through the same payment channel.
f) Disputes or chargebacks will be resolved under the Payment & Settlement Systems Act, 2007.

6.title: 6. DATA & CONFIDENTIALITY
6.content: All operational data, including Partner and customer details, is confidential and used strictly for business analysis, compliance, and service improvement under the Privacy Policy.

7.title: 7. LIABILITY & RESPONSIBILITY
7.content: The Company is not liable for damage, loss, or service disputes arising between Customers and Partners. Both parties act independently. The Company's responsibility ends at providing a secure facilitation platform.

8.title: 8. TAXATION & ACCOUNTING
8.content: All financial operations comply with the Indian GST Act and Income Tax regulations. The Company maintains transparent accounting practices and provides tax invoices for every transaction.

9.title: 9. COMPLIANCE
9.content: The Company abides by Indian laws, RBI regulations, and Information Technology guidelines. Any breach may lead to suspension or termination from the platform.

10.title: 10. LEGAL FRAMEWORK
10.content: All disputes arising from business transactions are subject to arbitration under the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996, and jurisdiction of Bangalore courts.

business_policy.footer: © 2025 KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES. All rights reserved.

customer_terms.title: Customer Terms & Conditions Agreement

1.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
1.content: This Agreement governs the relationship between the Customer and KOUSTUBHA FAST SERVICES ("the Company") when using the Swift Service mobile or web application for vehicle repair and maintenance bookings.

2.title: 2. SERVICE SCOPE
2.content: The Company operates as a digital platform facilitating the connection between Customers and independent Partners. The Company does not provide repair services directly but enables transparent communication, tracking, and payment systems.

3.title: 3. CUSTOMER RESPONSIBILITIES
items: - Customers shall provide accurate details regarding vehicle type, issue, and location.
- Customers must ensure availability at the chosen service slot.
- Payment must be made only through approved channels integrated into the application.

4.title: 4. SERVICE DELIVERY
4.content: Upon job confirmation, a verified Partner will visit the Customer's specified location to perform the service. Customers are encouraged to review pre-work and post-work photos before making payment.

5.title: 5. SPARES & CONSUMABLES
5.content: Spares and consumables used in services are mutually procured by the Customer and Partner. The Company is not responsible for supply, warranty, or quality of any consumable or spare part.

6.title: 6. PAYMENTS & CHARGES
items: - Charges will be shown to the Customer before confirmation of the booking.
- Payments can be made through UPI, Debit/Credit cards, Internet Banking, IMPS, NEFT, or Wallets integrated via authorized gateways.
- GST applicable (18%) on labour and parts, billed separately as per law.

7.title: 7. BANKS & PAYMENT GATEWAYS CLAUSE
items: a) All transactions are processed through RBI-approved payment gateways such as Razorpay or PayU.
b) Accepted payment methods include UPI, IMPS, NEFT, debit/credit cards, and digital wallets.
c) Amounts collected from the Customer are credited to the Company's current account and subsequently transferred to the Partner after applicable deductions (GST, platform fees, commission).
d) The Company follows PCI-DSS and RBI compliance guidelines; no payment credentials are stored.
e) Refunds (if applicable) are processed within 7-10 working days, subject to bank and gateway timelines.
f) Disputes or fraudulent transactions will be handled as per the Payment & Settlement Systems Act, 2007 and RBI circulars.

8.title: 8. CANCELLATION & REFUND POLICY
items: - Jobs canceled before Partner assignment incur no charges.
- Jobs canceled after Partner dispatch may attract a nominal visit fee.
- Refunds are processed in accordance with gateway timelines and refund rules.

9.title: 9. DATA PRIVACY
9.content: All customer information is protected under the Company's Privacy Policy and the Information Technology Act, 2000. Data may be used internally for service analytics and quality improvement.

10.title: 10. LIABILITY DISCLAIMER
10.content: The Company is not liable for damages or loss arising from third-party actions, parts malfunction, or Partner negligence. Customers are advised to verify all service details before final acceptance.

11.title: 11. GOVERNING LAW & ARBITRATION
11.content: This Agreement shall be governed by Indian law. All disputes shall be resolved through arbitration in Bangalore in accordance with the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996.

12.title: 12. ACCEPTANCE
12.content: By proceeding with booking or payment, the Customer agrees to these Terms and Conditions in full and acknowledges that the Company acts solely as a facilitation platform.
